| header 1 | header 2 | header 2 |
| :------- | :------: | -------: |
| cell 1.1 | cell 1.2 | cell 1.3 |
| cell 2.1 | cell 2.2 | cell 2.3 |

| _header_ 1   | **header 2** |
| ------------ | ------------ |
| _cell_ 1.1   | **cell** 1.2 |
| `|` 2.1      | \| 2.2       |
| `\|` 2.1     | [link](/)    |
| \_cell\_ 4.1 |              |
